text: I am very new to Python and am looking to use it to parse a text file.
The file has between 250-300 lines of the following format:

code:
---- Mark Grey (mark.grey@gmail.com) changed status from Busy to Available @ 14/07/2010 16:32:36 ----
----  Silvia Pablo (spablo@gmail.com) became Available @ 14/07/2010 16:32:39 ----

text: I need to store the following information into another file (excel or text) for all the entries from this file

code: UserName/ID  Previous Status New Status Date Time

text: So my result file should look like this for the above entried

code:
Mark Grey/mark.grey@gmail.com  Busy Available 14/07/2010 16:32:36
Silvia Pablo/spablo@gmail.com  NaN  Available 14/07/2010 16:32:39

text: Any help would be really appreciated
